greeting: What can Costrict do for you?
aboutMe: Thanks to the latest breakthroughs in agentic coding capabilities, I can handle complex software development tasks step-by-step. With tools that let me create & edit files, explore complex projects, use the browser, and execute terminal commands (after you grant permission), I can assist you in ways that go beyond code completion or tech support. I can even use MCP to create new tools and extend my own capabilities.

instructions.wantsToFetch: Costrict wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: Costrict wants to read this file:
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: Costrict wants to read this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: Costrict wants to edit this file:
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: Costrict wants to edit this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: Costrict wants to create a new file:
fileOperations.wantsToSearchReplace: Costrict wants to search and replace in this file:
fileOperations.didSearchReplace: Costrict performed search and replace on this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: Costrict wants to insert content into this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: Costrict wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: Costrict wants to append content to the end of this file:

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: Costrict wants to view the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: Costrict viewed the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: Costrict wants to recursively view all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: Costrict recursively viewed all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: Costrict wants to view source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: Costrict viewed source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: Costrict wants to search this directory for {{regex}}:

mcp.wantsToUseTool: Costrict wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server:
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: Costrict wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitch: Costrict wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: Costrict wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: Costrict wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode:
subtasks.wantsToFinish: Costrict wants to finish this subtask

browser.rooWantsToUse: Costrict wants to use the browser:

autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows Costrict to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust. More detailed configuration available in <settingsLink>Settings</settingsLink>.

announcement.description: Costrict {{version}} brings new features and improvements based on your feedback.

onboarding: The task list in this workspace is empty. Please enter a task below to get started.

autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.description: Costrict has reached the auto-approval limit of {{count}} API requests. Would you like to reset the count and continue the task?

shellIntegration.description: This command is running without shell integration. You can disable this warning in Costrict Settings Terminal, or troubleshoot terminal integration via the link below.
